programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: Mommy Dearest
programme.desc: It tells the story of a woman whose love for and obsession with her daughter borders on harmful and toxic behavior.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Grease Gun Brothers
programme.desc: Better known as the Grease Gun Brothers. Ramon (Dante Varona) and his brothers Rodrigo (Rey Malonzo), Romeo (Bembol Roco) and Renato (Roy Flores) play modern-day Robin Hoods to their urban poor community.

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: Sa Diyos Lang Ako Susuko
programme.desc: Romano disobeyed his father when he became a soldier. The old man believed that peace could only be attained if people were to avoid all forms of violence. How ironic for him then to come home and find his father murdered and the criminals unknown and unpunished?

programme.title: Sa Totoo Lang
programme.desc: Some of the country's finest actors joined the fun in this witty and totally hilarious look into the sex lives of lower middle class women who were old and single or separated, widowed, grass widowed, fooling around and everything else you could think of plus the assortment of men they met, fell for, cheated on, disliked, feared or anything else.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: Darna, Ang Pagbabalik (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: While trying to find her grandmother and little brother, Ding, Narda is viciously struck in the head and the stone that furnishes her power is stolen. Before the inevitable face-off with Valentina, Darna gains a new ally when she helps police lieutenant Max Ablan.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
